amendatorysection.catchline: Articles of incorporation; certificate of registration; filing.
amendatorysection.para: (1) One or more individuals residing within the State of Nebraska, each of whom is licensed or otherwise legally authorized to render the same professional service, may, by filing articles of incorporation and a certificate of registration with the Secretary of State, organize and become a shareholder in a professional corporation. The articles of incorporation shall conform to the requirements of section 21-220 and the certificate of registration shall conform to the requirements of sections 21-2216 to 21-2218.
(2) In addition to the requirements of subsection (1) of this section, the articles of incorporation shall contain a statement of the profession to be practiced by the corporation.
